Package sample

Class DBConnections

java.lang.Object
sample.DBConnections
public class DBConnections extends Object

DBConnections

This class is at the core of my program. It is used to retrieve and insert data to and from the database it is connected to.

    • get_all_appointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> get_all_appointments()

      Get All Appointments

      This method is used to get all appointments from the database. It also converts the time that they are stored in (utc) to local time based on the zoneid that the user is login on.
      Returns:
